title: No-bake banana split cheesecake
ingredients: ['200g digestive biscuit crumbs', '170g melted butter', '300g icing sugar', '450g cream cheese, softened', '1 (227g) tin pineapple, drained and pureed', '3 medium bananas, quartered', '325ml whipping cream, whipped', '8 glace cherries, halved', '4 tablespoons chocolate sauce', '60g flaked almonds']
